CustomField.description: Select "Yes" to group invoices by Purchase Order in addition to the selected Invoice Group By option. If "No" is selected, invoices will only be grouped by the default Invoice Group By setting.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select "Yes" to group invoices by Purchase Order in addition to the selected Invoice Group By option. If "No" is selected, invoices will only be grouped by the default Invoice Group By setting.
CustomField.label: Include PO in Invoice Grouping
